articles.author: Patti Domm
articles.title: Job Growth Looked Stronger in June as Companies Scrambled to Find Workers - NBC New York
articles.description: June jobs growth is expected to outpace May as more Americans rejoined the workforce, even as companies continued to struggle to find employees.
articles.content:

articles.title: A judge has again denied Britney Spears' request to remove her father from her conservatorship - SBS News
articles.description: It comes after the singer delivered an emotional statement to an American court last week, telling the judge she "just wants her life back".
articles.content:
A judge has shot down American pop singer Britney Spears' request to have her father removed from her conservatorship - at least for now.
